entities.label: VCORE usage
entities.description: VCORE usage exceeded expected threshold by 10%, reaching 82.6%
entities.source_text: VCORE 725mV 超過預期的10%使用率在82.6%

entities.label: MMDVFS
entities.description: MMDVFS data maintained at OPP4, indicating it was not the cause of VCORE level increase
entities.source_text: MMDVFS的資料來看 都維持在OPP4代表主要不是從MMDVFS造成 VCORE檔位的拉升

entities.label: DDR usage
entities.description: Combined DDR5460 and DDR6370 usage reached approximately 82.6%
entities.source_text: DDR5460跟DDR6370加起來的總使用率是達到82.6%左右

entities.label: DDR causing VCORE increase
entities.description: DDR usage appears to be causing the increase in VCORE level
entities.source_text: 看起來是DDR造成 VCORE檔位拉升

entities.label: CPU
entities.description: CPU components with high frequency settings: large core at 2700MHz, medium core at 2500MHz, small core at 2100MHz
entities.source_text: 可以從CPU 的部份看到 大核2700MHz，中核2500MHz，小核 2100MHz

entities.label: CPU frequency settings
entities.description: All CPU cores are set at high frequency settings, contributing to high usage
entities.source_text: 屬於都頂在天花板的設定上，都有高的占比

entities.label: CM causing VCORE increase
entities.description: Confirmed that CM is causing the increase in VCORE level
entities.source_text: 所以可以確認是因為CM造成拉檔的原因是確定的

relations.evidence: 所以可以確認是因為CM造成拉檔的原因是確定的

causal_effect.mechanism: CM activity increases VCORE usage by affecting power management settings.

relations.evidence: MMDVFS的資料來看 都維持在OPP4代表主要不是從MMDVFS造成 VCORE檔位的拉升
看起來是DDR造成 VCORE檔位拉升.
可以從CPU 的部份看到 大核2700MHz，中核2500MHz，小核 2100MHz 屬於都頂在天花板的設定上，都有高的占比.

causal_effect.mechanism: High frequency settings of CPU cores lead to increased CPU usage.
